original_title: 出張先の温泉接待でムリやり相部屋濃厚オヤジ達に朝までイカされ続けた私 翼あおい
overview: [Rich Old Man x Impossible Shared Room] Les new graduate female employees at a hot spring reception on a business trip! "After all, young girls are good ... their skin is beautiful and they are sensitive as well." Furthermore, I'm rolling up many times with a sweaty unmatched piston that lasts until the morning! Squirting Climax! I hate it! Haha! "I'm already here... Please stop because I'm already here..." A female employee with an exquisite body who was sacrificed for business negotiations.
title: I Was Fucked Until The Morning In The Room Of A Hotspring Hotel On A Business Trip, And I Loved It. Aoi Tsubasa
